channel.title: 508 server login text problem!
channel.description: Hi i wonder how i can change the server text on a 508 server when you log in i mean if it says like: welcome to dogscape 508 server... because when i change and then compile and then try the server i doesen't change? why does this happens?! Help!!! i talk about rubikscape 508 server. i did change myself to admin but change text and things, it gets back automatic even how many times i try! Help!! PLZZZZZZ[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2009, 08:25:39 am[/size][hr]Why someone don't help me? Help please!

item.title: 508 server login text problem!
item.dc:creator: @masterkorv12 masterkorv12
item.description:
@masterkorv12 wrote:

oh ok…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2009, 10:21:51 am[/size][hr]i tried login.java and frame.java and it auto changes back to rubik scape in the login java after i compile… it doesnt change to dscimscape as i want it… why does this happens why??? heeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeelp!!!

Read full topic

item.title: 508 server login text problem!
item.dc:creator: @public_boolean public boolean
item.description:
@public_boolean wrote:

If you wish to change the welcome screen message, that can be done in frames.java.
Or login.java

item.description:
@Keykcm wrote:

yeah, make sure that it is actually compiling, because sometimes the compiler doesn’t compile but if your not looking closely, you cant see that…so when you compile what does it say?

that will help you with your problem
